com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes
Class ShapeManager

java.lang.Object
  com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes.ShapeManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
LineManager, PolygonManager, RectangleManager, TextManager
public abstract class ShapeManager
extends Object

Provides an interface to use for managers of the various shapes. These classes handle all the various operations associated with drawing their shapes.

Since:
26/04/2004
Version:
1
Author:
David Terei

Method Detail

getDone

public boolean getDone()
Returns if the shape is complete, and a new shape ready to be drawn.

Returns:
If the shape is done.

getShape

public abstract Shape getShape()
Returns:
The shape being built, or done.

getOptionPanel

public static JPanel getOptionPanel()
Returns the JPanel that holds the various options associated with a tool/shape.

Returns:
A JPanel that contains the various options associated with a shape.

mousePressed

public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e,
                         int zoomLevel)
Manages the handling of Mouse Pressed events, subclasses will overide this method to provide drawing.

Parameters:
e - The mouse event to handle.
zoomLevel - The current zoom level of the image.
See Also:
PaintCanvas.getZoomLevel(), MouseListener.mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent)

                         int zoomLevel)
Manages the handling of Mouse Dragged events, subclasses will overide this method to provide drawing.

e - The mouse event to handle.

moveShape

public abstract boolean moveShape(Shape shape,
                                  MouseEvent e,
                                  int zoomLevel)
Move the shape given to where the mouse is. This method is implemented so that it works even when the shape is zoomed in on.

Parameters:
shape - The shape to move.
e - The mouse event to process and move the shape to.
zoomLevel - The zoom level of the image. 100% = 100
Returns:
If the operation succeeded.

getMode

public ShapeManager.Mode getMode()
Get the ShapeManagers current mode.

Returns:
The current mode of the class.

setMode

public void setMode(ShapeManager.Mode mode)
Set the shape managers current Mode to mode.

Parameters:
mode - The mode to set to.
